title: dsc resource list result
description: Describes the return data for a DSC Resource instance from the `dsc resource list` command.

description.title: Resource Description
description.description: A short synopsis of the DSC Resource's purpose.

path.title: Path
path.description: Indicates the path to the DSC Resource on the file system.

directory.title: Directory
directory.description: Indicates the path to the folder containing the DSC Resource on the file system.

implementedAs.title: Implemented as
implementedAs.description: Indicates how the DSC Resource was implemented.

oneOf.title: Standard implementation
oneOf.description: Indicates that the DSC Resource is implemented as one of the standard implementations built into DSC.

oneOf.title: Custom implementation
oneOf.description: Indicates that the DSC Resource uses a custom implementation.

custom.title: Custom implementation name
custom.description: The name of the custom implementation.

author.title: Author
author.description: Indicates the name of the person or organization that developed and maintains the DSC Resource.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Defines the DSC Resource's property names.

requires.title: Required DSC Resource Adapter
requires.description: Defines the fully qualified type name of the DSC Resource Adapter the DSC Resource depends on.
